item.title: Box Office Milestone: ‘Lilo & Stitch’ Becomes First Title of 2025 to Cross $1 Billion Globally
item.description: The live-action blockbuster is the first Hollywood film to join the billion-dollar club since fellow Disney 2024 family pic ‘Moana 2’ over Thanksgiving in 2024.
